original_text: But my love will never be taken away from him, as I took it away from Saul, whom I removed from before you.
korean_text: 내가 네 앞에서 물러나게 한 사울에게서 내 은총을 빼앗은 것처럼 그에게서 빼앗지는 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: But my love will never be taken away from him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나의 사랑은 결코 그에게서 빼앗기지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: as I took it away from Saul
whom I removed from before you
